title: Technology & Screens

questions.text: When we're hanging out at home, I'd prefer our phones to be...
choices: Put away so we can focus on each other
Around but not the main focus
Fine to scroll while we're chilling together
Depends on what we're doing

questions.text: When it comes to watching shows together, I'd like us to...
choices: Have a show that's 'ours' that we only watch together
Watch whatever we're in the mood for, together or solo
Binge together when we find something good
Have our own shows and share highlights

questions.text: If one of us is gaming or deep into something on our phone, I hope...
choices: We set some boundaries so it doesn't take over quality time
The other person joins in or finds their own thing
It's fine as long as we still have connection time
We can enjoy being in the same room doing different things

questions.text: For a cozy night in, my ideal screen situation is...
choices: Movie or show together, phones away
Background TV while we chat or do other things
Each doing our own thing on our devices, side by side
Mix it up depending on the mood

questions.text: When it comes to social media and sharing about us, I prefer...
choices: Keeping our relationship mostly offline
Occasional posts for special moments
Sharing more openly - I like celebrating us
Don't really think about it either way

description: Discover your screen habits and digital life together.
